title: The Naked Spice
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Indian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Formerly Foodies Bystro and moved here inside La Posada Rea in 2015. Began offering a separate vegan menu (Wed-Sat only), which includes curries, salads, lentils. Drinks include espresso and Indian chai. Sells Indian spice mixes. Local artists display their work for sale here. Holds a high tea on Saturday, vegan cooking classes sometimes. Free Wi-Fi.
